General.Name: Shandong Link Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Link Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells silica and carbon black in China and internationally. The company offers silica products, which principally include LK, LKHD, LKSIL series of silica for rubber industry, as well as silica for non-rubber industry; and carbon black products, such as N100, N200, N300, N500, N600, N700, and LK series rubber and specialty carbon blacks, including pigment carbon, and conductive carbon black. It also provides sodium silicate. The company's two series of products are used in tires and industrial rubber product, color masterbatch, cable shielding material, and feed and daily chemical industries. It serves tire, rubber products, rubber and plastic, feed, and footwear companies. Shandong Link Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Weifang, China
